The ones Cheetor taught did (sort of). And these guys could have 
easily been ignored if they observed close enough to learn. Also the 
rules intention was to keep them from fighting, so far he's just 
threatened Veratis. Make the knife iron then.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> Also Dewboy, where would the Protohuman have learned how to speak 
english? 
> Protohumans werent that smart.
